content.raw:
if the version number in package.xml is not used, could it be something that will not be confused with gazebo's own version number?   And insert a comment to clarify it's not being used?  E.g.

~~~
  <!-- NOTE:  this version number is not used, please refer to version number in gazebo's CMakeListst.txt -->
  <version>0.0.0</version>
~~~
content.html:
